Description: Madonna della Scodella; the Virgin Mary sits on the ground in the bottom left, holding a bowl (scodella) in her right hand; the young Jesus is on Mary's lap, holding Joseph's right hand; Joseph, stading on the right, handing a branch of palm tree to angels hovering above among clouds; two further figures and a donkey visible in the background Etching
Subjects: return of the holy family from egypt
Associated places: Associated with: Parma (city) (Church of Santo Sepolcro)
Acquisition notes: From Richard Ford's collection of prints after Correggio (1837,0408.14 to 669), purchased from him through Colnaghi's, for £250.
